Support analysis of alternatives to support those functional and solution requirements.The Team Deloitte's Government & Public Services practice-our people, ideas, technology and outcomes-is designed for impact. We incorporate expertise from across the firm to leverage common approaches, best practices, and strategic investments to scale these solutions according to industry strategy. Core Industry Solutions will be known in the market for a focus on transforming industry operations through industry technology solutions.
